dmca.title: Global Furniture in UK Claims Shop Surfer Site Infringes
dmca.body:
Dear Google

I am writing to inform you that at least one page of our web site has 
been copied in violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, and 
I formally request that you remove this page from your index.

The page in question is the index page of our web site at this URL

http://www.global-furniture.uk.com

The page which has been copied can be seen by visiting this web site:

http://shopsurfer.co.uk/eslink.php?u=aHR0cDovL2dsb2JhbC1mdXJuaXR01cmUudWsuY29tLw==

And this URL of the Google cache of the page will confirm this to be 
the case: 
http://66.102.9.104/search?q=cache:W9Jxl1TxJIMJ:shopsurfer.co.uk/eslink.php%3Fu%3DaHR0cDovL2dsb2JhbC1mdXJuaXR1cmUudWsuY29tLw%3D%3D+site:www.global-furniture.uk.com+%22other+artefacts+from+many+different%22&hl=en%20target=nw

And this search at Google will return the page:

http://wvvw.google.com/search?q=site:www.global-furniture.uk.com+%22other+artefacts+from+many+different%22&num=50&hl=en&lr=& 
newwindow=1&safe=off&filter=0

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials 
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not 
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the 
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am 
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that 
is allegedly infringed.

[private]Name
